steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Prepare release: set version to 0.0.1, then commit to local repository (Maven JGit-Flow Plugin).

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Prepare next development iteration: set version to 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT, then commit to local repository (Maven JGit-Flow Plugin).

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Tag 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT version to enable later checkout.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Reset HEAD reference back to release version.

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push release version to remote repository. Perform a release from the remote.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: <i class='fa fa-ban'/>The release failed. Fix the issue, then commit to local repository.

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push fix to remote repository, then retry the release from the remote.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: <i class='fa fa-check'/>The release went fine. Move HEAD reference to 'secret' to prepare the rebase.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: At this point, we're done; we could get rid of local repository. Here, we'll reset it to a working state.
